title: Select PO
intro:
Welcome to the "Merge POs" modal. There may come a time you need to merge two existing purchase orders.

ATUM will help you merge an existing purchase order, "the one you select here," into the currently edited purchase order.

title: Data to Merge
intro:
The following switches represent the sections to merge from the selected purchase order into the currently edited purchase order.

Deselect the switches of sections you do not want to include in the merge.

title: Replace Items
intro:
The "Replace PO Items" switch controls the product merging.

If left deactivated, ATUM adds products from the above-selected PO to the currently edited PO. ATUM will add the volumes/inventories on top if matching products are present.
When activated, ATUM replaces products and their volumes/inventories in the currently edited PO with products from the above-selected PO.
